sourcesContent: import{keyframes as a}from"../theme/stitches.config";export const reboundAnimation=a({"0%":{transform:"scale(0.95)"},"40%":{transform:"scale(1.02)"},"80%":{transform:"scale(0.98)"},"100%":{transform:"scale(1)"}});export const appearanceIn=a({"0%":{opacity:0,transform:"scale(0.95)"},"60%":{opacity:.75,transform:"scale(1.02)"},"100%":{opacity:1,transform:"scale(1)"}});export const appearanceOut=a({"0%":{opacity:1,transform:"scale(1)"},"100%":{opacity:0,transform:"scale(0.95)"}});
